content: Against Edom.Thus says the  of hosts:

For thus says the : “Behold, those whose judgment  not to drink of the cup have assuredly drunk. And  you the one who will altogether go unpunished? You shall not go unpunished, but you shall surely drink
For I have sworn by Myself,” says the , “that Bozrah shall become a desolation, a reproach, a waste, and a curse. And all its cities shall be perpetual wastes.”
Against Kedar and against the kingdoms of Hazor, which Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon shall strike.Thus says the :
The word of the  that came to Jeremiah the prophet against Elam, in the beginning of the reign of Zedekiah king of Judah, saying,
